featured.text: With a loud roar, the saw chewed into the 150-year old tree.
The men took out an axe and an electric saw and started cutting into the tree’s silky smooth skin.

definition.zh_def: 鋸子，一種用於切割木材或其他材料的工具，通常有鋸齒狀的邊緣。
definition.en_def: A saw is a tool used for cutting wood or other materials, typically having a toothed edge.
definition.example: He used a saw to cut the wooden plank in half.
